item.title: Need Urgent help please!
item.dc:creator: @ServerCr4eat3r ServerCr4eat3r
item.description:
@ServerCr4eat3r wrote:

ok guys so i have just added customs to my server and some are body plates and platelegs however when i try to wear the custom bodys and platelegs it for some reason puts the items in the slot where weapons are supposed to go… I have tried going to item.java and adding the code into the platelegs or platebody section but for some reason doesnt work! Some things you might need to help i will post below

                                          [u] Code i put in class 8 in my client[/u]

if(i == 15064)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10266;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9523;
